a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The employment-to-population ratio corresponds to the proportion of a country's population 15+ that is employed.
Employment to population ratio, 15+, female (%) (modeled ILO estimate)
Employment to population ratio, 15+, male (%) (modeled ILO
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
